DamageImmunities: Poison, Psychic, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Enhanced Sensors
Traits.Content: The drone has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Traits.Content: The drone can use its flying speed to evade attacks and has advantage on saving throws against effects that target it.

Actions.Name: Laser Scanning Beam
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: The drone releases a concentrated energy beam to target a creature within 60 feet. Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 5 (1d8 + 1) radiant damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Surveillance Burst
Actions.Content: Area Effect: The drone emits a burst of interference in a 15-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 5 (1d8 + 1) force damage. On a failed save, affected creatures also have disadvantage on their next attack roll as they struggle to recalibrate their senses.
